name: Necrootmancer
description:
A roguelike, turn-based, dungeon-crawl game.

A necrootmancer capable of dark "roots" magic adventures into the dungeon to spread evil.

Features:

  • Random generated dungeons.
  • Random generated events / encounters.
  • "Deck" and "Draw" mechanics. Skills casted will be shuffled back to deck.
  • Unique "roots" magic.

Control:

  • left click -- select.
  • right click -- cancel the selection of the current character.
  • w, s, a, d -- moving in world map / scroll game view in battle.
  • 1-9 -- quick skill selections in battle.

Developed by Sween Zhou (Programming & Arts)

Current music is from freemusicarchive by HoliznaCC0
